Description.Text: The Novotel New York Hotel enjoys a great location overlooking Broadway and Times Square, just one block from Rockefeller Center and two blocks from Radio City Music Hall and Fifth Avenue shopping. In the center of Midtown Manhattan on 52nd Street and Broadway, the hotel is close to subway trains that can whisk visitors to any spot in the city. The 33-story hotel offers spectacular views of Times Square from the seventh-floor Cafe Nicole and Broadway Bar and Terrace. Floor-to-ceiling windows at the European-style brasserie provide sweeping views of Broadway. The on-site Kids Corner has games and movies for young guests to enjoy.

• Rockefeller Center • Lincoln Center • Jacob Javits Convention Center 1 Miles • Madison Square Gardens 3 Miles • Central Park • Planet Hollywood • Fifth Avenue Shopping • Yankee Stadium 7 Miles • Times Square • Bronx Zoo 10 Miles
Located in the heart of Midtown, Manhattan s theater district on 52nd and Broadway. Offer spectacular views of Times Square from the 7th floor Cafe Nicole, Broadway Bar and Terrace. 480 rooms.
• Swimming Pool • Fitness Centre • Golf & Spa • Biking / Skating / Riding
• Major credit cards are accepted • Check In Time - 3 p.m. • Check Out Time - 12 p.m.

From LaGuardia International Airport: Turn left on Ditmars Blvd. Turn right on Astoria Blvd. North. Turn left onto Brooklyn Queens Expy. East toward Staten Island. Take the I-278 West exit onto the highway. Merge onto I-278 West. Take Exit 40/Broadway onto 69th Street toward Roosevelt Ave. Turn right on Roosevelt Ave. Continue on Queens Blvd., which becomes Queensboro Bridge. Take the ramp to the lower lever of the bridge. Take the ramp toward 2nd Avenue South and turn left. Turn right on 51st Street, then right on 8th Avenue. Turn right on West 52nd Street. The hotel is located on the right.
• CAFE NICOLE : Terrace Themed activities Type of cuisine : Brasserie Children's meal
